column5: This column will autocomplete as you type.  It uses Column A on the "People" sheet as reference.
column6: Required if the author does not have a description, otherwise optional but desired.  If there is significant book description that goes beyond author description, it's worth entering here. If authorship is in question or anonymous, mention of that certainly belongs here.
column9: Required if the author does not have date / place data, otherwise optional.  Fill them out if the data is significant, in light of the author data.
column15: Comma separated list of Primary English Titles from this sheet
